MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH8 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm due to a damaged underground cable, caused by third party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:28PM on Friday 16 April 2021.
